bench-press.name: Bench Press
bench-press.description: The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

push-ups.name: Push Ups
push-ups.description: Push-ups are a bodyweight exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, and core.

squats.name: Squats
squats.description: The squat is a fundamental lower body exercise targeting the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
